title: 1 Rp off
body: Right, so I was looking forward to Battle Regalia poppy going on sale, but then i saw the price. 240 Rp. I know that isn't a lot, but I somehow managed to spend an amount of Rp on who knows what, and now i have 259 Rp. Is there any chance Riot can give me that 1 Rp instead of having to buy some amount? I mean, i already spend enough on LoL, and I don't see much point in buying Rp, if the only skin i now want is Battle Regalia.

replies.body: you know 259 is greater than 240 don't you?

> [{quoted}](name=Aidan7787,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gJ2tmx8z,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-17T06:39:23.066+0000)
>
> you know 259 is greater than 240 don't you?

I figured it was just a typo.
lol I was thinking the same thing
Usually you can send a support ticket of a drawing using MS Paint and they will gladly give you a small amount of RP.
